  • Method Details

    • play

      public void play(int numPlayers)
      Play a game of Yaniv.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players in the game

    • callYaniv

      public boolean callYaniv(Collection<Card> hand)
      Call Yaniv. The calling Player must be sure to tally their points properly after making this call, similar to as if their Player.endRound() method had been called.
      Parameters:
      hand - the calling Player's hand
      Returns:
      true if the call is successful, false if the player is "assaf"ed

    • validate

      public static boolean validate(Set<Card> cards)
      Verify that the given set is valid under yaniv rules. Always returns false for Set of size 0.
      Parameters:
      cards - set of cards to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the given set is valid under yaniv rules.

    • peekDiscardPile

      public Set<Card> peekDiscardPile()

    • drawFromDiscard

      public Card drawFromDiscard(Card c, Set<Card> cards)
      Draw from the discard pile. TODO: assert rules about ends of a straight
      Parameters:
      c - the Card to be removed. Must be part of the previous player's discard.
      cards - valid set of cards to discard
      Returns:
      the requested Card

    • drawFromDeck

      public Card drawFromDeck(Set<Card> cards)
      Draw from the deck
      Parameters:
      cards - a valid combination of cards to discard
      Returns:
      the top card on the deck

    • slapDown

      public boolean slapDown(Card c)
      Attempt to slap down the Card which was just drawn. Only call if the card was drawn from the deck, not the discard pile. Successful only if performed before the next player's turn. Caller should only remove the Card from their hand if this returns true.
      Parameters:
      c - the card to slap down
      Returns:
      true if the slap down was succesful

    • tally

      public static int tally(Collection<Card> cards)
      Tally a Collection of Cards according to Yaniv rules laid out in the documentation of Card.yanivValue()
      Parameters:
      cards - the cards to be tallied
      Returns:
      the tally
